title: (x) GQ magazine fonts - HTF Gotham, FB Miller, Gridnik {Karl, Peter Henderson (self)}
content:
Does anybody know what typefaces these are?   
   
1-body copy(opening)   
   
 ![GQ body copy 1](http://web.archive.org/web/20110530220450im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25026.jpg)   
2-body copy(features)   
 ![GQ body copy 2](http://web.archive.org/web/20110530220450im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25027.jpg)   
3-hed   
 ![GQ head](http://web.archive.org/web/20110530220450im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25028.jpg)   
   
Any help much appreciated.   
Thanks!   
-Peter
author: anonymous

comments.content: Thanks for your speedy replies.. do you think that 2 is Miller?
I think so too. The leaning figure "6" is very typical.
